FuncDef: Use this command to configure up to 20 multi-chassis redundancy peers. Note that it is only for mc-lag (20) not for mc-sync (4).

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the IP address. Values-ipv4-address:|a.b.c.d, ipv6-address:|x:x:x:x:x:x:x:x   (eight 16-bit pieces), |x:x:x:x:x:x:d.d.d.d, |x:-[0 to FFFF]H, |		d: [0 to 255]D.
